title: Three months in Russian captivity: How one Ukrainian got out
description: In her first interview since her release, a Ukrainian paramedic tells CNN's Alex Marquardt about her three months in Russian captivity.

title: This is how the Akron police shooting of Jayland Walker unfolded
description: Jayland Walker suffered at least 60 wounds in a fatal shooting that occurred after Akron police attempted to stop him for traffic and equipment violations.

title: Amanpour presses Hungarian FM on controversial response to Russia's invasion of Ukraine
description: Christiane Amanpour speaks with Hungarian Foreign Minister Péter Szijjártó on Hungary's controversial response towards Russian aggression in Ukraine.

title: Photographer shares powerful story behind this kiss
description: As D'Angelo Lovell Williams posed for a kiss with a former partner, Glenn, in front of the camera, their faces each obscured by the black silk cloth of a backwards durag, the photographer had a famous painting in mind.

title: Amber Heard's attorneys ask court to toss verdict in Johnny Depp defamation case
description: Attorneys for Amber Heard have asked the court to throw out the verdict in the defamation trial with her ex husband Johnny Depp and either dismiss the case or order a new trial.

title: See Penguin restart colony from scratch in Argentina
description: There are thousands of Magellanic penguins in the El Pedral colony, said conservationist Popi García. Every spring these migratory waddlers return to breed. The new Original Series "Patagonia: Life on the Edge of the World" airs Sundays at 9 p.m. ET.

title: Analysis: July 4 parade slaughter again shows nowhere is safe from America's mass killing contagion
description: America's latest mass shooting turned a cherished July Fourth parade from a scene of patriotic joy into one of fear and death.

title: Gunman fired on unsuspecting parade attendees from a rooftop, authorities say
Is this the new normal for Australia's most populous state?
description: On a fine day, locals arrive on boats that motor up the Hawkesbury River in New South Wales to dine on the back deck of the Paradise Café.

title: 2 law enforcement officers shot during a July 4th festival in Philadelphia, source says
description: Two police officers were shot during a July Fourth celebration in Philadelphia, a law enforcement source with knowledge of the situation told CNN.

title: Paris' Eiffel Tower is reportedly badly in need of repairs
description: The Eiffel Tower is riddled with rust and in need of full repairs, but instead it is being given a cosmetic 60 million euro paint job ahead of the 2024 Olympic Games in Paris, according to confidential reports cited by French magazine Marianne.

title: Video shows the moment shots fired during Highland Park parade
description: A video shows the moment shots were fired into a Fourth of July parade in Highland Park, Illinois, which resulted in dozens injured and at least six dead.

title: See spectacular finale of DC fireworks show
description: Washington, DC's July 4th fireworks show ended with a bang as the US Air Force Band played "Come Alive" from the film "The Greatest Showman."

title: Uzbekistan says 18 killed, hundreds wounded in unrest
description: Eighteen people were killed and 243 wounded during unrest in Uzbekistan's autonomous province of Karakalpakstan last week, Uzbek authorities said on Monday -- the worst bout of violence in the Central Asian nation in 17 years.

title: Gunman fired on unsuspecting parade attendees from a rooftop, authorities say
description: Robert E. Crimo III, a person of interest in a mass shooting at a parade that left six dead and sent more than two dozen people to hospitals, has been taken into custody near Lake Forest, Illinois, authorities said during a brief news conference Monday night.

title: 'The Lost World': New book highlights Japan's abandoned rural spaces
description: Simply saying the word "Japan" can bring up images of manga, maid cafes and neon lights.

title: A Kentucky man has turned a pool of eels into his man cave
description: A pet store manager from Kentucky has turned the rainwater cistern under his garage into an eel pit. CNN's Jeanne Moos reports the eels are reeling in fans.
